body:
Hey Avicus,

I was playing avicus a lot today with Rilo and Jracer,

We won about 19 rounds and got up to 30+ kills. We then check the leaderboards and its the same as yesturday. My stats were low yesturday and aren't even counting to the leaderboard. I am sure this is happening with other people and this post IS NOT a scam. I am not asking you give me the kills and win backs. I am asking you fix this issue/glitch. To clear this up whenever we play our stats don't count to our "Stats/Leaderboards"

title: Question

replies.body: Also, it might take a little bit for the database to update.
